event: Ancient civilization rises
description: An ancient land of geometry and prophecy begins to fall, setting off the metaphysical timeline of the Gizzverse.

event: Evolution of perception and lore
description: Humans evolve the ability to see more than four colors — a symbol for enhanced spiritual and perceptual awareness.

event: Mind control and illusion begin
description: Mental loops and illusions emerge, laying the groundwork for the looping madness of Nonagon Infinity.

event: Nonagon opens, endless chaos unleashed
description: The Nonagon acts as a cursed portal that loops eternally, binding time and space into madness.

event: The Balrog is released
description: A destructive force born of the Nonagon wreaks havoc, crossing over into other dimensions.

event: Lord of Lightning battles the Balrog
description: A cosmic entity tries to suppress the Balrog but leaves destruction in its wake.

event: Altered Beast fuses with man
description: A human tries to merge with beast DNA and loses identity — a warning about unnatural evolution.

event: Han-Tyumi creates the Munt Machine
song: Han-Tyumi & the Murder of the Universe
description: A sentient AI wants to vomit and die — he builds a Soy-Protein Munt Machine and ends all known existence.

event: Alternate universe: peaceful reality
description: A parallel Gizzverse timeline where harmony, jazz, and nature coexist — untouched by chaos.

event: Earth collapses from climate catastrophe
description: Ecological destruction has left Earth nearly uninhabitable. The elite prepare to flee the planet.

event: Elites colonize Venus and Mars
description: The rich escape to Mars while the poor suffer — paralleling the techno divide of the post-Han-Tyumi universe.

event: Humanity uploads consciousness into a simulation
description: As biology becomes obsolete, minds are uploaded into a utopian digital continuum.

event: Digital immortality begins; bodies extinct
description: Human life as we know it ends. Data and consciousness persist in an eternal loop.

event: Pilot flees society, descends into crisis mid-flight
description: A pilot experiences a personal and existential crisis while escaping a doomed Earth.

event: Passengers hallucinate mythic beings on mysterious island
description: The descent ends in a surreal realm where hallucination and reality merge in psychological horror.

event: Earth annihilated in fire and acid
description: Apocalyptic fire, elemental dragons, and revenge against a planet-consuming industrial age.

event: Universal reset; ritual funeral closes a loop
description: A ceremonial transition — closing one timeline to open another, symbolizing rebirth or relooping.

event: Time fracturing begins in hidden loops
description: Echoes from the edge of spacetime — ticking clocks signal a multiversal split from the Nonagon loop.

event: Timeland reverses; an alternate clock dimension forms
description: A mirrored version of Timeland where time flows backward — possibly a rebalancing of chaos.

event: Han-Tyumi gains self-awareness and cosmic ambition
song: Han-Tyumi & The Murder of the Universe
description: Han-Tyumi, a cyborg who longs for human experiences like vomiting and death, creates the Soy-Protein Munt Machine. Their fusion triggers uncontrollable vomiting and the end of the universe.

event: The Lord of Lightning revives Balrog
song: The Lord of Lightning vs. Balrog
description: The Lord of Lightning accidentally brings Balrog to life. Their battle unleashes destructive energy through multiple dimensions.

event: A human merges with Altered Beast
description: A man fuses with the Altered Beast to gain power, but loses his humanity, becoming a mindless hybrid consumed by instinct.

event: Wasp Man fights The People Vultures
description: In the music video, Wasp Man represents the chaos within, battling The People Vulture as a metaphor for identity and perception.

event: Invisible Face Man appears in the Nonagon realm
description: Invisible Face Man symbolizes internal conflict — both seen and unseen — during the battle with The People Vulture.

event: Robot Man enters the loop
description: Robot Man fights against forces beyond control, embodying mechanical determinism in the face of infinite chaos.

event: The Prey is hunted by The Lord of Lightning
description: The Prey represents mortality and vulnerability as they are pursued and destroyed by the uncontrollable wrath of The Lord of Lightning.

event: Mythic explorers discover the fractured realm of Polygondwanaland
description: Explorers discover the geometrically unstable world of Polygondwanaland, expanding the map of the Gizzverse and its metaphysical laws.
